user.title: Add TR198A Ceiling-Fan
user.description:
Create a virtual remote for your TR198A ceiling-fan.

• **Broadlink remote** – the RM4-Pro (or similar) that will transmit the RF packets.
• **Dependent power switch** – optional. If the fan is powered through a smart wall switch, pick it here so the integration will automatically turn the switch **on** before every command.
• **Fan name** – friendly name you’ll see in the UI.

init.title: TR198A options
init.description: Update the Broadlink remote, dependent power-switch or friendly name.
